name: Wizard Heist
description:
You've put points into Trapfinding and Disarming and Lockpicking, and you've maxed out your Dexterity. But what if there were no die rolls? What if the only thing separating riches from death was your skill?

In this first-person action-adventure, you're a thief looting a wizard's lair. You'll need a steady hand to pick locks, good timing to dodge fire blasts, and a keen eye to spot exploding runes before they blow.

Step into the rogue's shoes and see how you'd really fare. Will you be hauling out treasure, or will the wizard be hauling out your corpse?

Controls:
Mouse and keyboard

Features:
Randomized levels
Jumping, dexterity, and memory puzzles
Four difficulty levels, each with its own high score list
Hundreds of weird, wonderful, and zany items to loot
Almost anything can be stolen. If it isn't nailed down, you can take it!
